verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Name Of Jesus! Highest Name! Name That Earth And Heaven Adore! From The Heart Of God It Came, Leads Me To Godâ€™s Heart Once More.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Name Of Jesus! Dearest Name! Bread Of Heaven, And Balm Of Love: Oil Of Gladness, Surest Claim To The Treasures Stored Above.{/lang-eng}
